name: Yurpy
tag_list: local-deals, coupons, free-deals, discounts, local-coupons, savings, save-money
overview:
Yurpy is the easiest way to get the biggest discounts on all things local in your city.

Yurpy is a website which will showcase free “deals” or coupons to local spas, restaurants, retail stores and local events. No more wasted spending on “group-buying” deals you forget you even have. Yurpy is free to users that don’t like the idea of forking over money for a deal they might never use.

Currently, Yurpy.com is offering local businesses a chance to get their deals listed for free on a two-week trial. These great deals will be available primarily for two cities of Louisiana: New Orleans and Mandeville Northshore area. All local businesses interested are being asked to visit http://yurpy.com/get-featured/ for details.

Yurpy team street scouts are visiting several local businesses trying to get connected and introduce themselves and service they provide. If all works well, it will be a bittersweet deal for local business, local shoppers and the local economy.

For more information please contact: Jason Chalmers at (855) GO-YURPY email: jason@yurpy.com Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/yurpy Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/@yurpy or visit the Yurpy website http://www.yurpy.com
